original_text: Then took they the body of Jesus, and wound it in linen clothes with the spices, as the manner of the Jews is to bury.
korean_text: 이에 예수의 시체를 가져다가 유대인의 장례 법대로 그 향품과 함께 세마포로 쌌더라

sentences.original_text: Then took they the body of Jesus
and wound it in linen clothes with the spices
sentences.korean_translation: 향료와 함께 아마 천으로 그것을 감쌌고

sentences.original_text: as the manner of the Jews is to bury
